name: La Presencia
description:
A game about pressence and absence.  A ghost pretending to go back to its grave. 

  • Pixel art!
  • Platform game!!
  • When you move, you cannot see the ghost. Do your best to remember the map!!!
  • Original soundtrack!!!
  • Complete all the levels as fast as you can to get the best score!!!

Credits: 

  • Music & VFX Artist - Adrián Bernet
  • 2D artist - Miguel Ángel Siruela
  • Programmer - Iván Moreno
  • Programmer - Lino Haller
